column5: Hi All! Heading off to fly into to Raggedwood Lake, northeast of Sioux Lookout. Never been there before. I would like to get some info on fishing spots from anyone. I have a copy on a lake map I could send, if some one could mark some spots and send back. I would really appreciate anyones help! Bill
I've been to Raggedwood twice. Can you send me a PM and I'll try and help you out?
